import React from 'react' function Body() { const [isContainerActive, setIsContainerActive] = React.useState(false); const signUpButton = (c) => { setIsContainerActive(true); }; const signInButton = (c) => { setIsContainerActive(true); }; const card1 = document.getElementById("card1"); const card2 = document.getElementById("card2"); const card3 = document.getElementById("card3"); /* change the size & background color of the card*/ const changeCard = card => { card.style.width = "100%"; card.style.height = "90%"; card.classList.remove('bg-primary'); card.classList.add('bg-dark'); } /* reset the size & background color of the card*/ const setBg = cards => { cards.style.width = "85%"; cards.style.height = "85%"; cards.classList.remove('bg-dark'); cards.classList.add('bg-primary'); } /*Details buttom */ const p1 = document.getElementById("p1"); const p2 = document.getElementById("p2"); const p3 = document.getElementById("p3"); const showDetail = p => { p.classList.remove('d-none'); } /* submit button*/ const submit = () => { alert("Submited!"); } return (
